Disable the Steel Watch Objectives

Figure out how to disable the Steel Watch

Orin told us not to underestimate Gortash's Steel Watch. She mentioned they come from the Lower City. We should find where they are made. Wulbren, leader of the Ironhand Gnomes, wants to disrupt Gortash's tyrannical rule by taking down his Steel Watch. He's made a runepowder bomb that can blow up the Steel Watch Foundry.
